content: loop of each st across 5 sts fasten_off and weave the yarn pull fip over weave leave a 10 cm yarn needle through the the yarn needle tail top of the folds through the top of the folds pull tie a knot sew to the back of the fish side fins any colour make two row 1 chain 4 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 single_crochet in each chain across 3 sts row 2-3 chain 1 turn make 1 single_crochet in the back loop of each st across 3 sts fasten_off and weave the yarn pull fip over weave leave a 10 cm yarn needle through the the yarn needle tail top of the folds through the top of the folds pull tie a knot sew to both sides of the fish link to video https //youtu be/lvm5zsmm-jk if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
